definition: definitely/absolutely (not)/(scoffing or dismissive interjection) Yeah, right./Tut!/to grind/close to/eager/to correspond to/see also 反切[fan3 qie4]
body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158

sentences.english: That is fueling specific trade-related concerns in some countries.
sentences.chinese: 一些国家对切身贸易问题的担忧情绪因此加剧。

sentences.english: Tribal dispute on the trouble caused, the U. S. military have personal experience.
sentences.chinese: 对由部落之争而引发的麻烦，美军有切身体会。

sentences.english: All that counts is what they feel.
sentences.chinese: 唯一重要的是他们的切身感受。

sentences.english: Both times I was pregnant I experienced pregnancy discrimination.
sentences.chinese: 我两次怀孕都切身体会了深受歧视的滋味。

sentences.english: It was soon clear to me that the feeling, though, was self-inflicted.
sentences.chinese: 不久我体会到那种感觉是她自己的切身感受造成的。

sentences.english: Whatever women are feeling, you are now free to feel it, too.
sentences.chinese: 女士们有怎样的感受，你们现在也能切身体会到了。

sentences.english: I smiled because I knew exactly how they felt.
sentences.chinese: 我也笑了，因为我能切身体会他们的感受。

sentences.english: The more you read, the more you are interested in reading. I have had such personal experience.
sentences.chinese: 书是越读越有趣，我有切身体会。

sentences.english: As is known that moving concerns with the actual personal benefit of the concerned subjects and social stability.
sentences.chinese: 拆迁关系到被拆迁人的切身权益和社会的安定。

sentences.english: Can write personal letters to convey life-related messages in details.
sentences.chinese: 能书写详细的私人信件，传达切身相关的讯息。

sentences.english: And when you speak up, offer suggestions or provide insights based on your experiences.
sentences.chinese: 当你发言时，要根据你的切身经验提供建议或见解。

sentences.english: Statistical data on the average wage in the public why such a deviation from personal experience?
sentences.chinese: 平均工资的统计数据为何如此偏离公众切身感受？

sentences.english: A railway station is the most difficult of all places to act in， as you have discovered for yourself.
sentences.chinese: 这火车站的戏可最难演，这点你一定也有切身体会。

definition: to know from experience/to learn through experience/to realize/understanding/experience
to feel as if it had happened to oneself/to sympathize/(polite expression of gratitude for a favor received by a friend etc) I take it as a personal favor
to sense/perception/to feel (through the senses)/to experience/a feeling/an impression/an experience
to put oneself in sb else's shoes
to talk from one's personal experience/to use oneself as an example
to know well/to be fully aware of
